name: GyroSphere Evolution
description:
If you’re in for a very challenging physics-based race against time in eye-catching environments, you’re looking at the right game.

Speed and focus are essential. And some good control of your temper would be advisable. Because mastering the GyroSphere is no easy task. You must get past all those ill-intentioned obstacles meant to throw you off the floating racetracks and finish the levels in the best possible time.

Not an easy road ahead, the racetracks feature lots of narrow passages, sudden drops, tight loops, dizzying downward spirals, slippery slopes and, of course, the ever-present obstacles. You’ll be very busy and… pissed off, but where’s the fun in playing easy games?

FEATURES:

- creative and challenging physics-based levels
- addictive gameplay
- amazing graphics
- swipe control
- different spheres to unlock and play with
- 48 tracks, 5 spheres, 5 environments (more coming)
- leaderboards
- special levels for PvP challenges
